languages.text: {n}Что-то меняется в лице офицера, лихорадочный блеск в глазах угасает.{/n} "Тацит, мой мальчик... его утащили болотные дьяволы. Я там, где должен быть, — ищу моего сына".

traits.locale_text: {n}Что-то меняется в лице офицера, лихорадочный блеск в глазах угасает.{/n} "Тацит, мой мальчик... его утащили болотные дьяволы. Я там, где должен быть, — ищу моего сына".

languages.text: {n}Something shifts in the officer's expression and the feverish gleam in his eyes goes out.{/n} "Tacitus, my boy... Swamp devils dragged him off. I'm where I'm supposed to be. I'm looking for my son."
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то меняется в лице офицера, лихорадочный блеск в глазах угасает.{/n} "Тацит, мой мальчик... его утащили болотные дьяволы. Я там, где должен быть, — ищу моего сына".

traits.locale_text: {n}Something shifts in the officer's expression and the feverish gleam in his eyes goes out.{/n} "Tacitus, my boy... Swamp devils dragged him off. I'm where I'm supposed to be. I'm looking for my son."

{n}Something shifts in the officer's expression and the feverish gleam in his eyes goes out.{/n} "Tacitus, my boy... Swamp devils dragged him off. I'm where I'm supposed to be. I'm looking for my son."

{n}Something shifts in the officer's expression and the feverish gleam in his eyes goes out.{/n} "Tacitus, my boy... Swamp devils dragged him off. I'm where I'm supposed to be. I'm looking for my son."

{n}Something shifts in the officer's expression and the feverish gleam in his eyes goes out.{/n} "Tacitus, my boy... Swamp devils dragged him off. I'm where I'm supposed to be. I'm looking for my son."

languages.text: {n}士官の表情の何かが変わり、熱を帯びた目の輝きが消えていく。{/n}「息子のタキタスが…沼の悪魔どもが彼を引きずりだしました。私はここにいるべきです…息子を探しているだけです」
languages.original_text: {n}Something shifts in the officer's expression and the feverish gleam in his eyes goes out.{/n} "Tacitus, my boy... Swamp devils dragged him off. I'm where I'm supposed to be. I'm looking for my son."

traits.locale_text: {n}士官の表情の何かが変わり、熱を帯びた目の輝きが消えていく。{/n}「息子のタキタスが…沼の悪魔どもが彼を引きずりだしました。私はここにいるべきです…息子を探しているだけです」

languages.text: {n}军官的神色发生了变化，他眼中狂热的光芒消失了。{/n}“塔西佗，我的儿子……沼泽里的魔鬼把他拖走了。这里就是我该在的地方，我在找我的儿子。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something shifts in the officer's expression and the feverish gleam in his eyes goes out.{/n} "Tacitus, my boy... Swamp devils dragged him off. I'm where I'm supposed to be. I'm looking for my son."

traits.locale_text: {n}军官的深色发生了变化，他眼中狂热的光芒消失了。{/n}“塔西佗，我的儿子……沼泽里的魔鬼把他拖走了。这里就是我该在的地方，我在找我的儿子。”

languages.text: {n}Algo cambia en la expresión del oficial y el brillo febril de sus ojos se extingue.{/n} «Tacitus, mi hijo... los diablos del pantano se lo han llevado. Estoy donde debo estar: buscando a mi hijo».
languages.original_text: {n}Something shifts in the officer's expression and the feverish gleam in his eyes goes out.{/n} "Tacitus, my boy... Swamp devils dragged him off. I'm where I'm supposed to be. I'm looking for my son."

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo cambia en la expresión del oficial y el brillo febril de sus ojos se extingue.{/n} «Tacitus, mi hijo... los diablos del pantano se lo han llevado. Estoy donde debo estar: buscando a mi hijo».

languages.text: {n}L'expression de l'officier change et la lueur fébrile dans son regard s'éteint.{/n} « Tacitus, mon garçon... Des démons des marais l'ont emporté. Je suis ici pour essayer de retrouver mon enfant. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something shifts in the officer's expression and the feverish gleam in his eyes goes out.{/n} "Tacitus, my boy... Swamp devils dragged him off. I'm where I'm supposed to be. I'm looking for my son."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression de l'officier change et la lueur fébrile dans son regard s'éteint.{/n} « Tacitus, mon garçon... Des démons des marais l'ont emporté. Je suis ici pour essayer de retrouver mon enfant. »

languages.text: {n}Der Gesichtsausdruck des Offiziers verändert sich, und das fiebrige Leuchten in seinen Augen verschwindet.{/n} "Tacitus, mein Junge ... Die Sumpfteufel haben ihn verschleppt. Ich bin da, wo ich jetzt sein muss. Ich suche meinen Sohn."
languages.original_text: {n}Something shifts in the officer's expression and the feverish gleam in his eyes goes out.{/n} "Tacitus, my boy... Swamp devils dragged him off. I'm where I'm supposed to be. I'm looking for my son."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gesichtsausdruck des Offiziers verändert sich, und das fiebrige Leuchten in seinen Augen verschwindet.{/n} "Tacitus, mein Junge ... Die Sumpfteufel haben ihn verschleppt. Ich bin da, wo ich jetzt sein muss. Ich suche meinen Sohn."

languages.text: {n}Subayın yüz ifadesinde bir şeyler değişiyor, gözlerindeki hummalı parıltı kayboluyor.{/n} "Bataklık şeytanları oğlum Tacitus'u götürdüler. Tam da olmam gereken yerdeyim. Oğlumu arıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Something shifts in the officer's expression and the feverish gleam in his eyes goes out.{/n} "Tacitus, my boy... Swamp devils dragged him off. I'm where I'm supposed to be. I'm looking for my son."

traits.locale_text: {n}Subayın yüz ifadesinde bir şeyler değişiyor, gözlerindeki hummalı parıltı kayboluyor.{/n} "Bataklık şeytanları oğlum Tacitus'u götürdüler. Tam da olmam gereken yerdeyim. Oğlumu arıyorum."
